Detailed Description

Abstract simle server class.

Used when a simple get- put-request functions in the subclass interface is sufficient to run the server.

virtual Server::~Server (   )  [virtual]
 

Delete the server.

Subclasses must: m_getThread->terminate() and release m_getThread from getRequest().
